description: The Operations Supervisor is responsible for managing and overseeing daily operations within the department, meeting customer and company KPI's and SLA's on a weekly, monthly and yearly basis, facilitating effective Problem Solving & Root Cause Analysis as needed, training, monitoring, evaluating, supervising and disciplining employees based on goals and duties, verifying employee time/payroll information and authorizing overtime, assisting in managing department workforce, reinforcing company policy and procedure and establishing and maintaining healthy working relationships across the organization, showing initiative and making suggestions for improving processes, assisting with planning and budget process, working in a fast-paced environment handling multiple tasks with complex deadlines, communicating with customers, vendors and employees, coordinating with other departments within the company, overseeing all LTL/Drayage operations, ensuring that all customer IRG requirements are met, able to make quick and precise decisions, and work well with a high number of seasonal temporary employees.

qualifications.required: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience, Strong Excel skills, 3+ years Supervision of associates, Previous production & manufacturing experience, 2+ years of LTL experience in inbound/outbound & dispatching, Knowledge of Word, Office, Strong written/oral communications skills, Problem solving capabilities, Able to work in a fast-paced environment, Must demonstrate ownership & responsibility to run the operation with a sense of urgency.
